function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of pathogenic particles in construction materials and surfaces","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Use of copper-infused materials for regularly touched surfaces, implementation of sensor-fitted entry doors, and reduction of horizontal surfaces","Technologies":"Copper-infused materials, sensor-fitted entry systems, motion sensor sinks","People":"Architects, builders, and construction workers","Owner":"Architects, construction companies, and building owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate design and placement of sinks leading to waste spillages","Impact":"Difficulty in cleaning and increased risk of contamination","Mitigation":"Proper design and placement of sinks to inhibit waste spillages and improve cleaning ease","Technologies":"Improved sink designs, sensor-fitted sinks","People":"Architects, builders, and building managers","Owner":"Architects and building owners"},{"Description":"Entryways and doors contributing to disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission through contact with doorknobs","Mitigation":"Integration of sensor-fitted entry doors and reduction of entry points to enable monitoring and compliance with guidelines","Technologies":"Sensor-fitted entry systems, motion sensor sinks, automatic door closing/opening systems","People":"Architects, building managers, and facility maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owners and managers"}]}
